title: Building for the next billion: tactics every team should employ
description:
The term “next billion users” gets bandied about in our industry. But change in the way we approach product development has to happen to meet these users across the chasm. 

The advice in this presentation goes beyond “talk to your users”. Learn a blueprint for assessing product-market-fit and positioning, measuring web3 trade-offs with your audience, and how to design the ultimate test of your solution without wasting thousands of hours of development time.
